name: Moses
hints: I led God's people out of slavery in Egypt
I received the Ten Commandments on Mount Sinai
I carried a staff that performed miracles, including parting the Red Sea
My sister was Miriam and my brother was Aaron
description: Moses was a prophet, leader, and lawgiver who led the Israelites out of Egyptian bondage and received God's law on Mount Sinai.

name: David
hints: I defeated a giant with just a sling and a stone
I was a shepherd boy before becoming king
I wrote many psalms and was called a man after God's own heart
My son Solomon built the temple in Jerusalem
description: David was Israel's greatest king, a skilled warrior, musician, and poet who established Jerusalem as the capital.

name: Mary (mother of Jesus)
hints: An angel named Gabriel appeared to me with an important message
I was visited by shepherds and wise men after giving birth
I treasured and pondered many things in my heart
I gave birth to Jesus in Bethlehem
description: Mary was chosen by God to be the mother of Jesus Christ, demonstrating remarkable faith and obedience.

name: Peter
hints: I was a fisherman before Jesus called me to follow Him
I walked on water but then began to sink when I took my eyes off Jesus
I denied knowing Jesus three times before the rooster crowed
Jesus gave me the keys to the kingdom and called me 'the rock'
description: Peter was one of Jesus' closest disciples, known for his bold faith and later became a leader in the early church.

name: Esther
hints: I was a Jewish orphan raised by my cousin Mordecai
I became queen of Persia through a beauty contest
I risked my life by approaching the king uninvited
I saved my people from a plot to destroy them
description: Esther was a brave queen who risked her life to save the Jewish people from genocide in Persia.

name: Daniel
hints: I was taken captive to Babylon as a young man
I refused to eat the king's food and chose vegetables instead
I interpreted dreams and visions for kings
I was thrown into a den of lions but God protected me
description: Daniel was a faithful prophet who maintained his devotion to God despite being in exile and facing persecution.

name: Ruth
hints: I was from Moab but chose to follow my mother-in-law and her God
I gleaned grain in the fields of a wealthy man
I said 'Where you go I will go, and where you stay I will stay'
I became the great-grandmother of King David
description: Ruth demonstrated loyalty, faith, and became part of Jesus' family line through her devotion to Naomi and God.

name: Paul (Saul)
hints: I persecuted Christians before my dramatic conversion on the road to Damascus
I was blinded by a bright light and heard Jesus speak to me
I went on three missionary journeys across the Roman Empire
I wrote many letters that became books of the New Testament
description: Paul was transformed from a persecutor of Christians to the greatest missionary and theologian of the early church.

name: Abraham
hints: God called me to leave my homeland and go to a land I had never seen
God promised to make my descendants as numerous as the stars
I had a son in my old age when I was 100 years old
God tested my faith by asking me to sacrifice my son Isaac
description: Abraham is known as the father of faith, who trusted God's promises and became the ancestor of the Jewish people.

name: Joshua
hints: I was Moses' assistant and took over leadership after he died
I led the Israelites across the Jordan River on dry ground
The walls of Jericho fell down after we marched around them
God told me to 'be strong and courageous' as I led His people
description: Joshua led the Israelites into the Promised Land and conquered Canaan through faith and obedience to God.

name: Jonah
hints: God called me to preach to the people of Nineveh, but I ran away
I was swallowed by a great fish for three days and nights
After being vomited onto dry land, I finally obeyed God
I was angry when the city I preached to actually repented
description: Jonah learned about God's mercy and compassion through his reluctant mission to Nineveh.

name: Joseph (son of Jacob)
hints: My father gave me a special colorful coat
My brothers sold me into slavery out of jealousy
I interpreted Pharaoh's dreams about seven years of plenty and famine
I became second-in-command of all Egypt
description: Joseph remained faithful to God through slavery and prison, ultimately saving his family and Egypt from famine.

name: Deborah
hints: I was both a prophetess and a judge in Israel
I sat under a palm tree where people came for judgment
I led Israel's army to victory over the Canaanites
I sang a victory song after the battle
description: Deborah was a wise leader and warrior who judged Israel and led them to victory through faith in God.

name: Gideon
hints: An angel found me threshing wheat in a winepress, hiding from enemies
God reduced my army from 32,000 to just 300 men
We defeated the Midianites using trumpets, torches, and jars
I asked God for signs using a fleece to confirm His will
description: Gideon was a reluctant hero who learned to trust God and led Israel to victory with a tiny army.

name: Noah
hints: I was called righteous in a generation of wicked people
God told me to build a massive boat on dry land
I gathered two of every kind of animal
My family and I survived a worldwide flood that lasted 40 days and nights
description: Noah obeyed God by building the ark and preserving life through the great flood.

name: Elijah
hints: I challenged 450 prophets of Baal to a contest on Mount Carmel
God sent fire from heaven to consume my sacrifice
I was fed by ravens during a drought
I was taken up to heaven in a whirlwind with chariots of fire
description: Elijah was a powerful prophet who performed many miracles and stood boldly against idolatry in Israel.

name: John the Baptist
hints: I ate locusts and wild honey in the wilderness
I baptized people in the Jordan River, calling them to repentance
I said 'Behold, the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world'
I baptized Jesus even though I said He should baptize me
description: John the Baptist prepared the way for Jesus' ministry through his preaching and baptizing.

name: Samson
hints: I was dedicated to God as a Nazarite from birth
My supernatural strength came from my uncut hair
I killed a lion with my bare hands
A woman named Delilah discovered the secret of my strength
description: Samson was a judge with extraordinary strength who struggled with self-control but ultimately defeated Israel's enemies.

name: Nehemiah
hints: I was a cupbearer to the king of Persia
I wept when I heard about Jerusalem's broken walls
I led the effort to rebuild Jerusalem's walls in just 52 days
We worked with a tool in one hand and a weapon in the other
description: Nehemiah was a dedicated leader who rebuilt Jerusalem's walls despite opposition, showing determination and faith.

name: Timothy
hints: Paul called me his 'true son in the faith'
My mother Eunice and grandmother Lois taught me the Scriptures
Paul wrote two letters to me that are in the Bible
I served as a young pastor and leader in the early church
description: Timothy was a young disciple mentored by Paul who became a faithful pastor and leader in the early church.
